definition.title: Latency across all mobile JSON endpoints
Requests/Errors on all Mobile API endpoints
Upserted by Source, Priority, and Index

requests.q: derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.fetch.time{es-cluster-name:staging-students OR es-cluster-name:uk-staging-students OR es-cluster-name:demo-students OR es-cluster-name:uk-production-students OR es-cluster-name:production-students} by {node_name})*1000/derivative(sum:elasticsearch.search.query.total{es-cluster-name:staging-students OR es-cluster-name:uk-staging-students OR es-cluster-name:demo-students OR es-cluster-name:uk-production-students OR es-cluster-name:production-students} by {node_name})

definition.content:
## Coming Soon

Once the Handshake Next Experience Layer Extraction is underway we'll add more controller actions here

formulas.alias: Can't send push to user (User hasn't used app or has disabled the notification preference)
